00006 class MMLView : public Gtk::DrawingArea
00007 {
00008 protected:
00009     MMLDocument *m_doc;
00010     MMLImage m_img;
00011 
00012     virtual bool on_expose_event(GdkEventExpose* e)
00013     {
00014         Glib::RefPtr<Gdk::Window> window = get_window();
00015         GdkWindow* gdkWindow = window->gobj();
00016         GdkDrawable* gdkDrawable;
00017         gint xOffset;
00018         gint yOffset;
00019         gdk_window_get_internal_paint_info(gdkWindow,
00020             &gdkDrawable, &xOffset, &yOffset);
00021         cairo_t* cairo = gdk_cairo_create(gdkDrawable);
00022         if ((xOffset != 0) || (yOffset != 0))
00023         {
00024             cairo_save(cairo);
00025             cairo_translate(cairo, -xOffset, -yOffset);
00026         }
00027         Gtk::Allocation allocation = get_allocation();
00028         int width = allocation.get_width();
00029         int height = allocation.get_height();
00030         paint(cairo, width, height);
00031         if ((xOffset != 0) || (yOffset != 0))
00032             cairo_restore(cairo);
00033         cairo_destroy(cairo);
00034         return false;
00035     }
00036 
00037     virtual void paint(cairo_t* cairo, int width, int height)
00038     {
00039         if (m_doc == 0) return;
00040         printf("paint!\n");
00041         m_img.setDocument(m_doc);
00042         cairo_set_source_surface(cairo, m_img.getSurface(), 0, 0);
00043 
00044         //cairo_set_source_rgb(cairo, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
00045         cairo_rectangle(cairo, 0.0, 0.0, width, height);
00046         cairo_fill(cairo);
00047     }
00048 
00049 public:
00050     MMLView() {
00051         m_doc = 0;
00052     }
00053     virtual ~MMLView() { }
00054     void setDocument(MMLDocument *d) {
00055         m_doc = d;
00056         queue_draw();
00057     }
00058 };

00060 class MMLEdit : public Gtk::Window {
00061 protected:
00062     MMLView m_view;
00063     Gtk::VBox m_vbox;
00064     Gtk::TextView m_xmledit;
00065     Gtk::Label m_error;
00066     MMLReader reader;
00067     MMLDocument *m_doc;
00068 
00069     void on_xml_changed() {
00070         printf("on_xml_changed\n");
00071         DOMString buffer = m_xmledit.get_buffer()->get_text().c_str();
00072         if (reader.parse(buffer)) {
00073             MMLDocument *old = m_doc;
00074             m_doc = reader.document();
00075             m_view.setDocument(m_doc);
00076             m_error.set_text("No errors");
00077             if (old) delete old;
00078         } else {
00079             //DOMString error = reader.error();
00080             //printf("parsed wrong? %i\n", error.length());
00081             m_error.set_text(reader.error().utf8());
00082         }
00083     }
00084 public:
00085     MMLEdit()
00086     {
00087         m_doc = 0;
00088         set_default_size(400, 400);
00089         set_title("Test");
00090         set_position(Gtk::WIN_POS_CENTER);
00091         add(m_vbox);
00092         m_vbox.add(m_view);
00093         m_vbox.add(m_xmledit);
00094         m_vbox.add(m_error);
00095 
00096         m_xmledit.get_buffer()->signal_changed().connect(
00097             sigc::mem_fun(*this, &MMLEdit::on_xml_changed));
00098 
00099         m_vbox.show();
00100         m_view.show();
00101         m_xmledit.show();
00102         m_error.show();
00103 
00104         m_xmledit.get_buffer()->set_text(
00105             "<msqrt><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></msqrt>");
00106     }
00107 
00108     virtual ~MMLEdit() {
00109         if (m_doc) delete m_doc;
00110     }
00111 };
